column1:
#Text=color=purple">

HAGRID (\*\*H\*\*uman-in-the-loop \*\*A\*\*ttributable \*\*G\*\*enerative \*\*R\*\*etrieval for \*\*I\*\*nformation-seeking \*\*D\*\*ataset) is a dataset for generative information-seeking scenarios.
#Text=We are planning to release baseline models soon!

#Text=## Contact  If you have any questions, feel free to email us (project.miracl \[at\] gmail.com) or start a Github issue under this repository.   ## License  This work is licensed under the Apache 2 license.

#Text=See \[LICENSE\](LICENSE) for details.  ## Citation If you find this dataset and repository helpful, please cite HAGRID as follows: ``` @article{hagrid,       title={{HAGRID}: A Human-LLM Collaborative Dataset for Generative Information-Seeking with Attribution},        author={Ehsan Kamalloo and Aref Jafari and Xinyu Zhang and Nandan Thakur and Jimmy Lin},       year={2023},       journal={arXiv:2307.16883}, } ```
